original_text:
But behold, the Lord will strip her of her possessions
    and strike down her power on the sea,
    and she shall be devoured by fire.
korean_text: 주께서 그를 정복하시며 그의 권세를 바다에 쳐넣으시리니 그가 불에 삼켜질지라

sentences.original_text: the Lord will strip her of her possessions
and strike down her power on the sea,
and she shall be devoured by fire.
